prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Drums, Guitar, Brass, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This composition features Piano, Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Brass, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Piano, Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Brass, but Reed is absent.

Style 3:
This piece has Piano, Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Brass, but Reed is not included.
